amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires the specific authorization of Congress for the creation of refuges of more than 500 acres or the expansion of a new refuge that results in an acreage of more than 500 acres.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a perfecting amendment to the Committee amendment in the nature of a substitute, to exempt new land acquisitions of less than 500 from the provisions of the bill that require Congressional authorization before funds are used from the Land and Water Conservation Fund to acquire land for the creation of a new refuge or any future expansion of a new refuge.

action.text: Boehlert amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. Modification to clarify that the prohibition on the use of funds from the Land and Water Conservation Fund would apply only to new refuges greater than 500 acres in size or the future expansion of those new refuges that would result in the refuge exceeding 500 acres. Existing refuges would be exempt from the provisions of the act.
On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
